entry.title: $2500 // Stunning and spacious 1BR with private garden
entry.content:
This stunningly beautiful, 1-bedroom apartment is a must-see. Equipped with floor to ceiling windows, the apartment gets tremendous natural light and overlooks your own private zen garden.

Kitchen is newly renovated with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Enough space to have a 1-2 person office in home. Only two blocks from the convenient JMZ line, the apartment features sustainably harvested wood, floor to ceiling high efficiency windows, recessed lighting, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and large closets.

Offering beauty, tranquility and privacy with its state of the art services and amenities, this renovated building features a shared Zen Garden with waterfall and FREE LAUNDRY, video intercom, available storage (fee), parking (fee), and optional maid, valet, and concierge services (fee). This apartment has a private little terrace, enough space to put a BBQ and table out there.

Besides being convenient to transportation, the building is situated near some of the best restaurants and cafes Williamsburg is well known for such as Marlow and Sons, Diner, Peter Luger, Streets, Motorino and more. Bike storage inside the building (free).
Pets allowed case by case with one time non-refundable fee.

This is the most beautiful apartment you will come across in New York city - it is a complete steal. Apartment can come furnished or not.

entry.title: $2400 // INCREDIBLE DEAL *NO FEE* 3 BED $2400 WILLIAMSBURG
entry.content:
No Broker Fee!!
Prime Williamsburg.Updated stainless steel appliances, double door closets in bedrooms, sealed off fire place, close to L and G.
Contact at anytime for questions/showings.
